title: Bill Hader’s Status As a Sex Symbol Is Cemented at the Emmys
text:
Photo: ROBYN BECK/AFP/Getty Images

Bill Hader has a history of inspiring a thirst among the Cut staff, but his universal appeal was cemented this evening at the Emmy Awards, where he won for Outstanding Comedy Actor for HBO’s Barry. It was Hader’s second win for his show, in which he plays a hitman, stalker, and psychopath, who is also very hot.

The first tweets rolled in as he shambled down the red carpet, where he proceeded to tower over hosts and pose, uncomfortably, for photos.

he is TALL and i am in LOVE pic.twitter.com/DBcKIrob76 — bill hader updates (@billyhader) September 23, 2019

Photo: John Shearer/Getty Images

After Hader won his Emmy and delivered a perfect speech in his signature nasal deadpan, Hader fans came together in (horny) congratulations:

Bill Hader won an Emmy for dat ass....and exceptional talent on a fantastic television show. — Allison P Davis (@AllisonPDavis) September 23, 2019

Bill Hader is REALLY sexy in person. Not that he isn't sexy on stage at the #emmys. I'm just saying he's also super sexy in real life. As a way of bragging that I've talked to him in real life. — Elaine L. (@LaineyGossip) September 23, 2019

bill hader is the only man that can raw me pic.twitter.com/A08EHTVO94 — alyx (@LADYFlLMS) September 23, 2019

The actor inspired a fresh wave of thirst after presenting an award alongside Phoebe Waller-Bridge, whose combined charm proved overwhelming for many:

give bill hader and phoebe waller bridge an oscar for their presentation it's what they deserve — bill hader oscar campaign (@parkergaiI) September 23, 2019

FUCK YOU BILL HADER YOU ARE TOO PERFECT pic.twitter.com/X0PnqaNBVL — 𝐜𝐚𝐫𝐨𝐥 (@tonyrvgers) September 23, 2019

Don’t be surprised when “Bill Hader feet” is trending tomorrow morning.
